channel.title: Realm PK
channel.description:
http://youtu.be/jGuc7zScE-4 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7t2nOILGNuU&list=UUOgYaOHwzxed8TVegy6AfRA
[img]http://www.adriancourreges.com/images/download-small.png[/img][b]Server Client:[/b] [url=http://www.realm-pk.com/client.php]www.realm-pk.com/client.php[/url] [img]https://moodle.org/theme/image.php/moodleorgcleaned_moodleorg/forum/1398247490/icon[/img][b]Server Website:[/b] [url=http://www.realm-pk.com]www.realm-pk.com[/url] [img]http://www.gigaflat.com/images/icons/consoles.png[/img][b]Server WebClient:[/b] [url=http://realm-pk.com/webclient.php]http://realm-pk.com/webclient.php[/url]
- Stable economy, no dupes. - Click on a skill you want and choose from 1 to 99 lvl! - Chaos Dwarf Battlefield 100% Drop Hand cannon, Hand cannon shoot etc. - Revenants 100% Drop pvp item Vesta's, Statius's etc. - Summoning Pack yak, Unicorn stallion, Bunyip 100% - Avatar Random spawn in Wilderness 100% Drop! - Zamorakian spear emote 100% - Dragon Claws 100% - Korasi's sword 100% - Ring of recoil 100% - 24/7 Dedicated. - Vote reward shop - 100% Hand cannon! - Good PvP Combat - Friendly staff members - Many bosses For rare pvp item! - 100 % Duel arena - No lagg - 100 % working Divine and Elysian effects - Normal drops Wild boss getting a pvp armour/weapon. - Working Arcane stream,Sol - Ancient Curses - Chaotics,that aren't overpovered - Pkp shop, PVM shop, and alot more - Artifacts,also gainable from Player killing,just bigger chance to get it. Sell those for cash.... - Donator shop with good benefits - Corp in the wilderness - Tormented demons - Bork - Fully working Void effects - Theres more,just come and you'll see it yourself.
[img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/9137/ph4x.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/7728/03f7ec6c027fbfb21399e7d.png[/img] [img]http://www.part.lt/img/5c069e798b9450706c33e720c86b9d64741.png[/img] [img]http://www.part.lt/img/7836d859377981589135aef882928b75187.png[/img] [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/9130/duelx.png[/img] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/3779/pkeriaix.png[/img]
